verses.verse: And Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH559> unto Moses<WH4872>, Go<WH935> in unto Pharaoh<WH6547>, and say<WH559> unto him<WH559>, Thus saith Jehovah<WH3068>, Let my people<WH5971> go<WH7971>, that they may serve me<WH5647>.
And if thou refuse<WH3986> to let them go<WH7971>, behold<WH5062>, I will smite all thy borders<WH1366> with frogs<WH6854>:

and the river<WH2975> shall swarm<WH8317> with<WH8317> frogs<WH6854>, which shall go up<WH5927> and come<WH935> into thy house<WH1004>, and into thy bedchamber<WH2315>, and upon thy bed<WH4296>, and into the house<WH1004> of thy servants<WH5650>, and upon thy people<WH5971>, and into thine ovens<WH8574>, and into thy kneading-troughs<WH4863>:
and the frogs<WH6854> shall come up<WH5927> both upon thee<WH5971>, and upon thy people, and upon all thy servants<WH5650>.

And Jehovah<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Moses<WH4872>, Say<WH559> unto Aaron<WH175>, Stretch forth<WH5186> thy hand<WH3027> with thy rod<WH4294> over the rivers<WH2975>, over the streams<WH5104>, and over the pools<WH98>, and cause frogs<WH6854> to come up<WH5927> upon the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>.
And Aaron<WH175> stretched out<WH5186> his hand<WH3027> over the waters<WH4325> of Egypt<WH4714>; and the frogs<WH6854> came up<WH5927>, and covered<WH3680> the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>.
And the magicians<WH2748> did<WH6213> in like manner with their enchantments<WH3909>, and brought up<WH5927> frogs<WH6854> upon the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>.

Then Pharaoh<WH6547> called<WH7121> for Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175>, and said<WH559>, Entreat<WH6279> Jehovah<WH3068>, that he take away<WH5493> the frogs<WH6854> from me<WH5971>, and from my people; and I will let the people<WH5971> go<WH7971>, that they may sacrifice<WH2076> unto Jehovah<WH3068>.

And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> unto Pharaoh<WH6547>, Have thou this glory<WH6286> over me<WH4970>: against what time shall I entreat<WH6279> for thee<WH5650>, and for thy servants, and for thy people<WH5971>, that the frogs<WH6854> be destroyed<WH3772> from thee and thy houses<WH1004>, and remain<WH7604> in the river only<WH2975>?
And he said<WH559>, Against to-morrow<WH4279>. And he said<WH559>, Be it according to thy word<WH1697>; that thou mayest know<WH3045> that there is none like unto Jehovah<WH3068> our God<WH430>.
And the frogs<WH6854> shall depart<WH5493> from thee<WH1004>, and from thy houses, and from thy servants<WH5650>, and from thy people<WH5971>; they shall remain<WH7604> in the river only<WH2975>.

And Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> went out<WH3318> from Pharaoh<WH6547>: and Moses<WH4872> cried<WH6817> unto Jehovah<WH3068> concerning the<WH1697> frogs<WH6854> which he had brought<WH7760> upon Pharaoh<WH6547>.
And Jehovah<WH3068> did<WH6213> according to the word<WH1697> of Moses<WH4872>; and the frogs<WH6854> died<WH4191> out of the houses<WH1004>, out of the courts<WH7704>, and out of the fields.
And they gathered them together<WH6651> in heaps<WH2563>; and the land<WH776> stank<WH887>.
But when Pharaoh<WH6547> saw<WH7200> that there was respite<WH7309>, he hardened<WH3513> his heart<WH3820>, and hearkened<WH8085> not unto them<WH3068>; as Jehovah had spoken<WH1696>.

And Jehovah<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Moses<WH4872>, Say<WH559> unto Aaron<WH175>, Stretch out<WH5186> thy rod<WH4294>, and smite<WH5221> the dust<WH6083> of the earth<WH776>, that it may become lice<WH3654> throughout all the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>.

And they did<WH6213> so<WH175>; and Aaron stretched out<WH5186> his hand<WH3027> with his rod<WH4294>, and smote<WH5221> the dust<WH6083> of the earth<WH776>, and there were lice<WH3654> upon man<WH120>, and upon beast<WH929>; all the dust<WH6083> of the earth<WH776> became lice<WH3654> throughout all the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>.

And the magicians<WH2748> did<WH6213> so with their enchantments<WH3909> to bring forth<WH3318> lice<WH3654>, but they could<WH3201> not<WH3654>: and there were lice upon man<WH120>, and upon beast<WH929>.

Then the magicians<WH2748> said<WH559> unto Pharaoh<WH6547>, This is the finger<WH676> of God<WH430>: and Pharaoh<WH6547>'s heart<WH3820> was hardened<WH2388>, and he hearkened<WH8085> not unto them<WH3068>; as Jehovah had spoken<WH1696>.

And Jehovah<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Moses<WH4872>, Rise up early<WH7925> in the morning<WH1242>, and stand<WH3320> before<WH6440> Pharaoh<WH6547>; lo<WH3318>, he cometh forth to the water<WH4325>; and say<WH559> unto him<WH559>, Thus saith Jehovah<WH3068>, Let my people<WH5971> go<WH7971>, that they may serve me<WH5647>.

Else <WH5971>, if thou wilt not let my people go<WH7971>, behold<WH7971>, I will send swarms<WH6157> of flies upon thee<WH5650>, and upon they servants, and upon thy people<WH5971>, and into thy houses<WH1004>: and the houses<WH1004> of the Egyptians<WH4714> shall be full<WH4390> of swarms<WH6157> of flies<WH127>, and also the ground whereon they are.

And I will set apart<WH6395> in that day<WH3117> the land<WH776> of Goshen<WH1657>, in which my people<WH5971> dwell<WH5975>, that no<WH1115> swarms<WH6157> of flies shall be<WH1961> there<WH4616>; to the end thou mayest know<WH3045> that I am Jehovah<WH3068> in the midst<WH7130> of the earth<WH776>.
And I will put<WH7760> a division<WH6304> between my people<WH5971> and thy people<WH5971>: by to-morrow<WH4279> shall this sign be<WH226>.

And Jehovah<WH3068> did<WH6213> so<WH935>; and there came grievous<WH3515> swarms<WH6157> of flies into the house<WH1004> of Pharaoh<WH6547>, and into his servants<WH5650>' houses<WH1004>: and in all the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> the land<WH776> was corrupted<WH7843> by reason<WH6440> of the swarms of flies<WH6157>.
And Pharaoh<WH6547> called<WH7121> for<WH413> Moses<WH4872> and for Aaron<WH175>, and said<WH559>, Go<WH3212> ye<WH2076>, sacrifice to your God<WH430> in the land<WH776>.

And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559>, It is not meet<WH3559> so to do<WH6213>; for<WH2005> we shall sacrifice<WH2076> the abomination<WH8441> of the Egyptians<WH4714> to Jehovah<WH3068> our God<WH430>: lo<WH2076>, shall we sacrifice the abomination<WH8441> of the Egyptians<WH4714> before their eyes<WH5869>, and will they not stone us<WH5619>?
We will go<WH3212> three<WH7969> days<WH3117>' journey<WH1870> into the wilderness<WH4057>, and sacrifice<WH2076> to Jehovah<WH3068> our God<WH430>, as he shall command us<WH559>.

And Pharaoh<WH6547> said<WH559>, I will let you go<WH7971>, that ye may sacrifice<WH2076> to Jehovah<WH3068> your God<WH430> in the wilderness<WH4057>; only ye shall not go<WH3212> very<WH7368> far away<WH7368>: entreat<WH6279> for me<WH1157>.

And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559>, Behold<WH3318>, I go out from thee<WH6279>, and I will entreat Jehovah<WH3068> that the swarms<WH6157> of flies may depart<WH5493> from Pharaoh<WH6547>, from his servants<WH5650>, and from his people<WH5971>, to-morrow<WH4279>: only<WH7535> let not Pharaoh<WH6547> deal deceitfully<WH2048> any more<WH3254> in not<WH1115> letting the people<WH5971> go<WH7971> to sacrifice<WH2076> to Jehovah<WH3068>.
And Moses<WH4872> went out<WH3318> from Pharaoh<WH6547>, and entreated<WH6279> Jehovah<WH3068>.

And Jehovah<WH3068> did<WH6213> according to the word<WH1697> of Moses<WH4872>; and he removed<WH5493> the swarms<WH6157> of flies from Pharaoh<WH6547>, from his servants<WH5650>, and from his people<WH5971>; there remained<WH7604> not one<WH259>.
And Pharaoh<WH6547> hardened<WH3513> his heart<WH3820> this time<WH6471> also<WH5971>, and he did not let the people go<WH7971>.
